game.title: Eternal Realms
game.synopsis: In a world where magic has disappeared, the land is plagued by a dark force known as the Shadowfall. Players take on the role of a brave adventurer seeking to unite the fragmented realms against this common enemy and uncover the secrets behind the disappearance of magic.
game.beginning: The game begins with the player's character arriving in the town of Brindlemark, where rumors of a ancient prophecy have drawn many adventurers. As they gather information and resources, they soon discover that they are the chosen one destined to wield the power of the elements and restore balance to the world.
game.ending: After traversing treacherous landscapes, forging alliances with other realms, and defeating formidable foes, the player finally uncovers the source of the Shadowfall: a powerful artifact created by an ancient civilization. With the fate of the world hanging in the balance, the player must make a choice between harnessing the artifact's power or destroying it to restore magic to the world.
